about_the_game:
About This Game

“Step into the intense competition of the Industrial Revolution and outsmart your rivals with your strategy! Roll the dice to progress, buy factories, make upgrades and outsmart your opponents on your way to victory in this fun board game for friends. Draw cards and make game-changing decisions with the right moves. Trust your luck and your wits and become the leader of industry!”

Roll Dice, Strategize, Win!

Each round, players roll dice to move across the game board and perform different actions depending on the slots they are standing on. Trust your luck and make the best moves; buy factories, make upgrades and strengthen your strategy. With the uncertainty of the dice, each game is a new experience!

Source and Factory Alignment: The Road to Victory!

In the game, resource slots play an important role in gaining strategic advantages! When players have factories that match the production type of these special slots, the efficiency of their factories increases. At the same time, if your opponents have factories with the same production type, their productivity will decrease. Manage resource slots wisely to strengthen your own production and weaken your opponents. Make the right moves and you'll be on your way to becoming the industry leader!

Develop Your Strategy: Change the Fate of the Game with Cards!

Use the cards in your hand strategically and gain the upper hand over your opponents! Play the right card at the right time to outplay your opponents and gain the edge you need for victory!

Powerful Moves on the Playing Field: Special Slots!

By using special slots, you can put your opponents in a difficult position during the game and strengthen your own strategy. Don't miss the opportunity to change the course of the game with the right moves using these slots!

name: Industrial Dominion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ti or AMD R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 470 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dominate your opponents in Industrial Revolution Britain. Strategize, play your cards smart and trust your luck. Gather your friends and play to prove you're the strongest.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish
